    • Method Detail

      • isRegistryMetacard

        public static boolean isRegistryMetacard(Metacard metacard)
        Checks that the metacard passed in has the Registry metacard tag and a valid RegistryId.
        Parameters:
        metacard - - will have tags and RegistryId evaluated
        Returns:
        true if registryId is present in the metacard with the Registry_Tag, false otherwise

      • isInternalRegistryMetacard

        public static boolean isInternalRegistryMetacard(Metacard metacard)
        Checks that the metacard passed in has the internal Registry metacard tag and a valid RegistryId.
        Parameters:
        metacard - - will have tags and RegistryId evaluated
        Returns:
        true if registryId is present in the metacard with the Registry_Tag_Internal, false otherwise

      • getRegistryId

        public static String getRegistryId(Metacard metacard)
        Returns the registry id of the metacard passed in. In most cases this method expects that the user has already evaluated the metacard with the isRegistryMetacard method from this class.
        Parameters:
        metacard - - the metacard for which the registry Id will be returned
        Returns:
        the String representation of the metacard's registry id attribute, null if not present

      • isIdentityNode

        public static boolean isIdentityNode(Metacard metacard)
        Identifies whether the metacard is a registry identity node
        Parameters:
        metacard - - metacard to be evaluated for registry identity status
        Returns:
        true if the metacard is an identity node, false otherwise

      • isLocalNode

        public static boolean isLocalNode(Metacard metacard)
        Identifies whether the metacard is a local registry node
        Parameters:
        metacard - - metacard to be evaluated for local registry status
        Returns:
        true if the metacard is an local node, false otherwise

      • getBooleanAttribute

        public static boolean getBooleanAttribute(Metacard metacard,
                                          String attributeToCheck)
        Identifies whether the metacard has the attribute and its boolean value
        Parameters:
        metacard - - metacard to be evaluated for boolean attribute
        attributeToCheck - - attribute to be evaluted, expected to be boolean in value
        Returns:
        true if the attribute is present and set to true, false if the attribute is not present set to null, or not a boolean valued attribute

      • getStringAttribute

        public static String getStringAttribute(Metacard metacard,
                                        String attributeToCheck,
                                        String defaultValue)
        Attempts to return a String attribute's value. If the attribute is null the default value will be returned instead.
        Parameters:
        metacard - - metacard to be evaluated for a String type attribute
        attributeToCheck - - attribute to be checked for, should have a String type
        defaultValue - - the value expected to be returned if the attribute is not present
        Returns:
        the defaultValue if attribute is not present, otherwise a String representing the value of the attribute

      • getListOfStringAttribute

        public static List<String> getListOfStringAttribute(Metacard metacard,
                                                    String attributeToCheck)
        Attempts to return a List of Strings from an attribute. If the attribute is null the default value will be returned instead.
        Parameters:
        metacard - - metacard to be evaluated for a List of Strings type attribute
        attributeToCheck - - attribute to be checked for, should be a List of Strings type
        Returns:
        the defaultValue if attribute is not present, otherwise a List of Strings representing the values of the attribute

      • hasAttribute

        public static boolean hasAttribute(Metacard metacard,
                                   String attributeName)
        Simple method to just check for the existance of an attribute on a metacard
        Parameters:
        metacard - - metacard to check for attribute on
        attributeName - - name of attribute to check
        Returns:
